room_title: Escape room "Prison Bus Escape" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: So much fun!!!! We did escape from Alcatraz. Bryce who acted as Al Capone was amazing and it was so much fun and team building. First escape room and I will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Bus Escape" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: We brought my son and 10 of his friends to do the Prison bus and they had an amazing time. All the kids enjoyed themselves and couldnâ€™t stop talking about it after we left. Would definitely bring do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Bus Escape" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: We love it, my wife and I take our nieces who are all under 18 and we book out the room so it's just us. Have made it out of all 4 rooms with our best time being Prison Bus at 17 minutes left. We will keep driving all the way from Brigham City for the best games and best employees in Utah!
